column4: Fixing twitter by chatting with Parag won't work

This is hard to do as a public company , as purging fake users will make the numbers look
terrible , so restructuring should be done as a private company .

Can you take 10 minutes to talk this through with me ? It has been about 24 hours since you

column4: Acknowledging your text with Parag yesterday that you are declining to join the board . This

column1: will be reflected in our 8 - K tomorrow . I've asked our team to share a draft with your family
office today . I'm looking forward to speaking today .

column4:
It is better , in my opinion , to take Twitter private , restructure and return to the public
markets once that is done . That was also Jack's view when I talked to him .

After several days of deliberation - this is obviously a matter of serious gravity - I have
decided to move forward with taking Twitter private . I will send you an offer letter tonight ,
which will be public in the morning . Happy to connect you with my team if you have any
questions . Thanks , Elon

Confirming I received your email . Also , please use btaylor@gmail.com going forward , my
personal email .

Elon , as you saw from our press release , the board is in receipt of your letter and is evaluating
your proposal to determine the course of action that it believes is in the best interest of
Twitter and all of its stockholders . We will be back in touch with you when we have
completed that work . Bret

Elon , I am just checking in to reiterate that the board is seriously reviewing the proposal in
your letter . We are working on a formal response as quickly as we can consistent with our
fiduciary duties . Feel free to reach out anytime .
